channel.title: How to create funpk?
channel.description: I searched the bar for some Funpk tuts! i got two atleast both didnt work! please please help! im stuck on the part where you have to write in the public boolean FunPk absx(blablabla im stuck on the absx part please guys im begging you i mean please!!!!!! i really need help! this is getting anoying dont tell me get a guide cause guids are not helping me can someone tell me how to use the boolean FunPk absx(blablabla part please!!!!!!!!!! please!!!!!!!!!!! thanks

item.title: How to create funpk?
item.dc:creator: @x_sam_x1 x sam x
item.description:
@x_sam_x1 wrote:

hey, i know this is an old post, but i can sort of help you, public boolean inFunPk() { if(absX >= #### && absX <= ++++ && absY >= $$$$ && absY <= ****) { return true; } else { return false; }.
replace: #### = With the lowest x coord in your fun pk area.
replace: ++++ = With the highest x coord in your fun pk area.
replace: $$$$ = With the lowest y coord in your fun pk area.
replace: **** = With the highest y coord in your fun pk area.

ok i hoped it helped, and here are a few tuts if you need:
Tut 1
Tut 2

Read full topic
